org.gvsig.educa.portableview

Interface PortableViewManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPortableViewManager

    public interface PortableViewManager
extends Disposable
    Library Manager.

    Expose main library's functionalities:
    • Set default folders configuration
    • Get installed Portable View
    • Identify and get a Portable View from a file
    • Create a new PortableViewCompilation instance
    • Create a new PortableViewCompiler instance
